message: Sarah Lane!  She is so cute.

I suppose newcomer Lisa Bettany will have to take the title. As a model, she's pretty well established as gorgeous, and I do agree with the general consensus. (The eyes, in my opinion, are the thing). But I've still got plenty of affection for Amber, Sarah L., Dr. Kiki, Becky W., and all the other TWiT Ladies.
Gina. Programmers are hot.
ambermac, mostlylisa, veronicabelmont, natalimorris, ijustine
this really should not be offensive.
mostlylisa is mostlybeautiful :D
The point is all of the lovely ladies mentioned are bright and beautiful.  It's good television.
Is this authorized by TWiT, some may find this iffensive, I would go with Lisa though.
seriously this topic?  why?
They're all beautiful I agree. I'm partial to Amber, Sarah, Becky, Veronica,Cali, and Natali. But they're all amazing awesome Geek Girls.
Geek Girls really are the best!
@richardya LOL.... "some may find this offensive... but while we're at it... LISA!" HAHA also.... i think there needs to be 100% more iJustine.
Amber Mac, Becky Worley, Veronica Belmont,  Lisa Bettany,  Natali Morris, ijustine
Sarah, she's wacky, geeky, and cute.
@rowast Because this area isn't censored.
You can see a lot of them here: http://USCute.com
From what i can tell they're all hot! :D
@craigshipp Interesting interview with Gina. She's lost weight since then.
Girls in tech are hot, period.
Amber is cute too, but seriously, Lisa will rule them all.

Mostly Lisa, Simply Gorgeous. But they're all kinda yummy. Although I think this kind of topic may be a bit inappropriate in a TWiT group. I tend to like all of them, and I don't want to start ranking them in public. The TWiT ladies are both attractive and smart, which is a very effective and compelling combination. They are good at what they do, they attract a crowd, and people won't be bored. That's one reason why Leo doesn't have to worry about losing his loyal TWiT audience any time soon.
Amen my fellow geeks, I agree
Lisa
I am attracted to voices and content more so than faces when it comes to podcasts.
@brandonsadkins i guess it's a hint for convore to implement some sort of /ignore :)

I don't care how attractive they are. Leave that to CNN and celebrities. It's somewhat inappropriate to rate/rank them in public, as iurus said, and it's extremely superficial. I listen to and watch TWiT for the content and conversation. It's their intelligence that matters to me, and nothing else.
This thread is not necessarily "offensive", it's just shallow, and potentially rude.
@brandonsadkins Do you think in womens forums they don't talk about men? I sure they're much more rude. Fact! We all like attractive and smart people. I don't think that's offensive or rude.

Agreed, this is not particularily rude, and this place doesn't have to be as overly PC as, say, the TWiT chatroom. Nevertheless, this is a generic forum for both genders, which is readable by anyone. A kind of an extension of the TWiT show ( w/o the moderators), so I think it's just common sense to keep some sort of balance. IOW, when we maintain a certain level of good taste without becoming ridiculously PC, we're just fine. :)

@brandonsadkins good points but like it or not in the real world appearances do matter and TWiT wants ratings just like any other network so I'm sure there's no coincidence that many of the female TWiT team members are attractive.
I love them all, they all have great Beauty , Grace, Personality and Humor , What could be better
Hey, women are free to make a "Hot men on TWIT" thread - though I think, even though I'm a heterosexual male, that such a thread would be fairly short given the cast of characters on twit *g*
I would go with Tom in the Hot Men category, and Lisa in women. I'm not gay not there is anything wrong with that.
Gina Trapani.  Intelligence is sexy and she and Kiki are the only real geeks.
We would not talk about them at all if they were speaking pure drivel. No one watching TWiT is toling for babes. We love hearing the smart beautiful women on TWiT. I'm tired of this subject!!!!

@lessfeet I agree Woman have to put up with enough crap when trying to break through the glass ceiling. I am interested in what people have to say and contribute on TWIT and not what they look like. Leave that to the celebrity garbage on commercial TV.

@Ford_Prefect2nd Speaking of geunine geek babes, I'd love to see Jeri Ellsworth to join the gang. Gina, Kiki and Jeri would make a cool She-Geek Trio. I wonder what they might come up with;  Kiki would handle the scientific theory, Gina would take care of the software and Jeri the hardware. I wonder if we should be very afraid..? ;-D
This topic reminds me of this post: http://mostlylisa.com/blog/nominated-for-wired-sexy-geek-of-2007-but-why-so-sad/
I see Veronica said she'd wear a Star Trek  uniform - did that ever happen? :)
Physical beauty is great but intellectual beauty is best ... behind every pretty face is a soul and a brain ... cant pick any particular one ... they're all great in their own way
hottest mind : Gina + KIKI
Lisa has such a sexy voice... Amber Mac is very pretty, Sarah is cute. bur honestly Leo takes the cake...
@S6xtoe Are you saying Leo is the hottest woman on twit? :)
Either Amber, Sarah or Lisa.
Defo Amber :)
Ooo yeah forgot about Lisa :) Pete is a lucky guy !!
If you don't start considering, me Jason, Leo, Darren, Scott, and RAndall I'm going to protest for sexism.
I understand
Ok it has to be leo then sorry Tom :)
You come a close second my mrs says :)
I mostly listen to audio so based on voice it's definitely Justine...although she would probably win either way :)
Yeah justine is a babe !!

Justine is too california for me
iJustine is a true New Media talent and TWiT would be even better with her as a regular.
